programme.desc: There is a magic window that happens on the lakes of Michigan as winter finally starts to break. Zona knows well of its greatness and has invited pro angler Chris Zaldain to help reap it's bounty.

programme.desc: Carter and old friend Julio Meza head to the Juan Fernandez Archipelago situated 400 miles off the coast of Chile in search of a giant kingfish yellowtail, fishing around the famed Robinson Crusoe Island.

programme.title: Livin' the Dream With Captain Jimmy Nelson
programme.desc: Jimmy and Luiza divide their time between fishing and seeing some of the wilder side of El Salvador.

programme.title: Bill Dance Saltwater
programme.desc: We're taking a look back at the life and great times of one of Bill's most dear friends, Theophile Bourgeois. Part 1.

programme.title: The Seahunter
programme.desc: Rob is in Key West fishing on his new Seahunter CTS 41' with his good friend Mike; they head offshore on the hunt for non-stop reel-screaming action.

programme.title: BigWater Adventures
programme.desc: Fishing Mark's home waters of Charleston, S.C., with The Redfish Mafia.

programme.title: Two Conchs Sportfishing TV
programme.sub-title: The Annual End of the Year Guide's Trip
programme.desc: Each year Jack rewards his captains with a well-earned vacation, and this year the name of the destination is St. Augustine; join the crew as they kick back and celebrate another successful year.

programme.title: Spear Life
programme.sub-title: Backyard Spearfishing With A World Class Chef
programme.desc: Jon has his good friend, Jerrett Davis, down to the Brunson Compound for some backyard spearfishing. The guys end up filling the cooler with plenty of fish, and of course experience some top-of-the-line cooking in the Sunshine State.

programme.title: Facts of Fishing
programme.desc: After several mind numbing days on the water with no fish to show for it, Dave heads out for redemption.

programme.title: In Fisherman TV
programme.desc: The In-Fisherman staff goes into beast-busting mode, as they fish for the Niagara River's brutish smallmouths; stretch the limits of heavy-duty tackle for bruiser blue cats; and take you down a historic road of discovery in the quest for muskies.

programme.title: Fishing With Roland Martin
programme.desc: Roland uses topwater Zara Spook Jr for dozens of strikes of tarpon and snook.

programme.title: Lake Commandos

programme.desc: On The Nightcap we explore and question other lifestyles and cultures with an enthusiastic, open mind and hope to leave our viewers happily pondering new perspectives. Whether it's inviting the most provocative guests to the signature pink couch or hearing your take on controversial topics, the conversations never disappoint. From game night to ordering in munchies, The Nightcap will keep you wanting more. It's sexy, it's risqu, it's everything you wouldn't expect from late-night TV.

programme.title: Divorce Court
programme.desc: The venerable courtroom show takes a look at real-life couples. The soon-to-be exes tell their stories to the judge, who gives the ruling and settles all the usual -- and unusual -- divorce issues by the end of the episode. This is the third incarnation of the show titled "Divorce Court," with the first having premiered in 1957.
